glsa.title: TikiWiki: Arbitrary command execution
glsa.synopsis: A bug in TikiWiki allows certain users to upload and execute malicious PHP scripts.

background.p: TikiWiki is a web-based groupware and content management system (CMS), using PHP, ADOdb and Smarty.

description.p: TikiWiki does not validate files uploaded to the "temp" directory.

impact.p: A malicious user could run arbitrary commands on the server by uploading and calling a PHP script.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All TikiWiki users should upgrade to the latest version:
